Name: PLAYNE : The Meditation Game
About the game: Covid19: Playne is free for nurses & doctors. About Playne Helps you to build a daily habit of mindfulness Discover the benefits of meditation & mindfulness Learn tools that can help you care for your mental wellbeing Available in VR. You must download the VR DLC to launch in VR. Gameplay Features Beautiful island that grows and transforms with your daily meditations Grow different species of trees and create unique biomes that reflect your journey Change the weather and time to create immersive relaxing ambiences Create your own serene nature spaces by planting trees and flora in Sandbox mode Complete Playne to unlock a massive island for you to explore and grow with mindfulness Helping you build a daily habit of meditation and mindfulness Playne is an island that grows with you. As you build a daily practice of mindfulness, seeds grow into trees, Aurora Borealis light up your night sky, and you'll unlock the powers of weather and time. Explore a range of meditations and tools to care for your wellbeing Easy to understand, easy to practice meditations, including audio-guided meditations that help you discover mindfulness. Write freely using an innovative mindful journaling tool. Learn exercises that help you reconnect with your body through breath. Create deeply relaxing environments Select the scenery, choose the weather, pick a time, put your headphones on and begin the journey to your inner world and discover the various aspects of your beautiful self. Grow Various Types of Trees (2021 Biomes Update) Your island can grow different species of trees and you can create multiple biomes for each of the game modes in Playne. Create in Sandbox Mode. Explore in Evolve Mode, Plant seeds and design your own Playne in Sandbox mode. Complete Playne to unlock Evolve mode where you can explore an expansive open-world island and grow immense forests. A companion for your journey Talk to Fox to discover the story of Playne and to find out how to approach healthy living and build healthy habits. Support Reforestation Complete Playne, and we will plant a tree to celebrate your journey near Tweedsmuir Hills in Scotland. Available in VR for Free You must download the free DLC to enable VR mode. VIVE Cosmos is not officially supported. Quest 2 supported in tethered mode only, and not wireless . Not getting an option to run Playne in VR? Make sure the DLC is fully downloaded and installed then restart your computer. Hello from the Developer Meditation is a way for us to learn about ourselves by discovering our inner world. As we better understand our inner world, the better we can respond to our outer world. I grew up with meditation and video games, and I'm exploring how video games can make it easier to learn and build a habit of meditation and mindfulness. With nearly 15+ significant updates and 50+ patches, Playne has made a full journey from early access to full release thanks to its wonderful community's feedback and support. Krish is a solo game dev and a BAFTA New Talent nominated filmmaker from Scotland.
